OK, I know this doesn't have anything to do with evolution, but certain members of this board have been quite valiantly beating on their erected strawman, so I thought I would post this, rather than members having to constantly correct them
 
 http://angryastronomer.blogspot.com/2006/07/big-bang-common-misconceptions.html

T.Q., why oh why did you supply this resource? You've given Marc9000 a confession from his opponent!
 
 

 3) There's no evidence for the Big Bang
 
 Sadly, yes, I have actually seen this one fairly often. I have no idea where people get the idea that scientists make things up without having good evidence behind it (oh wait... we're out to disprove God because all scientists hate God or some XXXX like that).
 

 
 Now everyone will know Marc was right all along--that there is an atheist science conspiracy.
